table.caption: Guild Location Goals
rows: Prevent a magical catastrophe inside the location.
Find the source of strange occurrences in or near the location.
Escape the location (and help others escape) when a disaster occurs inside.
Quell a riot inside or around the location.
Kill or drive out a monster that has turned the location into its lair.
Defend the location against an external attacker.
Infiltrate the location and report on what's happening inside.
